game.name: Elsa Mermaid Dress Up
game.description:
The beautiful princess Elsa keeps changing her look to impress ladies around her. Today she has decided to carry the look of a beautiful mermaid. After wearing that look, she is going to find her love. This is the first time when the princess wants to be mermaid, so she does not know how to get that look to face her prince. Would you come forward to give your helping hands to the needy girl? Join Elsa Mermaid Dress Up and help the princess to design a perfectly mermaid style outfit!
Luckily, you would have a plenty of outfit options to help you out. Browse through a wide range of hairstyles, dresses for the upper part, and tail designs in this free online dressing game for girls! Put some classy and matching jewelry on her beautiful neck and make the background look worth watching by inviting some fishes around her! Give her a new mermaid tail and get her ready to show some magic!
Do every possible every effort to transfer her simple appearance into a cute new mermaid look! Give her a stylish hairstyle, choose a new top along with a matching mermaid tail and do not forget to accessorize her dress with the matching hair clips, jewelry and a magic wand. Good luck to dress her up in all different styles of awesome mermaid outfits! Explore the fantasy world in our new mermaid games for girls and enjoy fun to the fullest online, no download required!
